history.content:
I also took CS 70 over the summer and submitted my form. If you submitted the major declaration form correctly you should have received this email from cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu :


> Dear (Your Name),
>
>Your application for the L&S CS major has been successfully submitted!
> Please note that your application will be processed at the end of the term when grades are made available to the department (which is usually 1-2 weeks later than when grades are available to you). Decisions will be emailed 4-6 weeks after the end of the semester.
>
> Course Enrollment Tips:
> Undeclared students will not be able to enroll in upper division CS courses until they have been declared in the major. For information about CS Enrollment policies and priority, please visit our website. Also, please subscribe to the EECS 101 piazza to stay up to date.
If you have any questions, please email us at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu.

If you didn't receive this, I would recommend emailing cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu

> Dear (Your Name),

I also took CS 70 over the summer and submitted my form. If you submitted the major declaration form correctly you should have received this email from cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu :

Dear (Your Name),

Your application for the L&S CS major has been successfully submitted!

Please note that your application will be processed at the end of the term when grades are made available to the department (which is usually 1-2 weeks later than when grades are available to you). Decisions will be emailed 4-6 weeks after the end of the semester.

Course Enrollment Tips:
Undeclared students will not be able to enroll in upper division CS courses until they have been declared in the major. For information about CS Enrollment policies and priority, please visit our website. Also, please subscribe to the EECS 101 piazza to stay up to date.

If you have any questions, please email us at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu.
The application wasn't due until Thursday. Please give us some time. We have advising lines.

I filled in and submitted the major declare form for Computer Science during the summer, when I finish CS 70 and fulfill all 3 requirement for declaring CS. But I still did not receive any update regarding my major info. Therefore, I would like to make sure if my application form is successfully submitted.
history.subject: Major Declarion
